title: US Supreme Court to hear Bayer’s appeal against weedkiller lawsuits
description: German group is seeking to end multibillion-dollar litigation alleging its Roundup pesticide causes cancer
content: German group is seeking to end multibillion-dollar litigation alleging its Roundup pesticide causes cancer
